website_summaries.verdict: A quality oil with fairly light consistency and scent. However, if you prefer a thicker oil, this one may disappoint you.
pros: Sourced from trees grown without pesticides
Doesn't feel too heavy or greasy
cons: Color is a bit "off," leading some users to question if it contains filler oils

customer_reviews.title: Original one just like the ones found in Brazil
customer_reviews.text: I’m from brazil and I know how this is supposed to smell and taste. Its just like the originals ones from brazil. Its pure copaiba oil trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Souza

customer_reviews.title: Love my upnature oils!
customer_reviews.text: Love all my upnature oils, these are all I use for my face and skin and I never use make up.... I’ll be 65 in a week.
customer_reviews.author: koshanna

customer_reviews.title: Mislabeled, bottle contents are not 100%amla oil
customer_reviews.text: I‘m not sure what to make of this product or if it actually works. So far it has made no difference. Then i read the fineprint on the bottle and it states „ submerged in virgin sesame oil“?? So how much of the amla oil was added to the sesame oil is the question. I find the labeling misleading „amla oil“ 100% pure and natural if it is cut with an unknown amount of sesame oil. Maybe thats why i dont see results. Its disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Taking 3 drops a day in a capsule is helping with my arthritis
customer_reviews.author: Citizen scientists

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I live with chronic pain, and tried this oil an especially painful nerve damaged pain in my foot. I put it on t night and for the first time this year, the pain was significantly less. Not gone, it not a miracle worker but man... livable. I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: ... and recently was treating an infection and remembered the excellent and incredible Copaiba oil that traditional people colle
customer_reviews.text: I worked in Forestry in the Brazilian Amazon and recently was treating an infection and remembered the excellent and incredible Copaiba oil that traditional people collected and used. So I went online and after poking around choose this one. This is as described as much as I can tell pure copaiba oil, the sap of the Copaiba tree. Good job! Very happy to have choose this one. Copaiba is an incredible anti-infectant...try it on any wound...just heals...amazing...sometimes heals too quickly even...great product...
customer_reviews.author: miguelfeitosa

customer_reviews.title: Solid essential oil
customer_reviews.text: This is not exactly young living or doterra quality, but it is good quality. Mine was pure. It had the right scent. It helps with pain. I mixed some in coconut oil and used topically. Worked really well for severe muscle pain.
customer_reviews.author: 💚TosaTat💚Top Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: One of the best essential oils to have!
customer_reviews.text: Please research about copaiba oil. I recently joined an oil Of the month and got a small bottle of copaiba oil. I looked it’s up and it supposedly does wonders for pain. My husband And i started using it -he suffers from migraines/shoulder and back pain, I suffer from Neck, back and migraines-and it works great to get rid of the pain naturally. Just put some in your fingers and rub it in! Works in minutes. It’s helped us a lot. The best is when we massage each other with it and helps us sleep really good. For massaging I’ve even mixed it with a carrier oil(fractionated coconut oil).
customer_reviews.author: Janel MH

customer_reviews.title: Voodoo juice... It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: My sister in law has a bumb shoulder. Her son suggested she try this. While I was visiting she was using it. I asked about it and she said I should try it because she loved it. Voodoo juice is what she called it. I bought it and love it. Great pain relief for my knees and my husband's back and it doesn't stink.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Diamond

customer_reviews.title: I have another brand but I thought I'd try this one because of the great price but sorry to say it doesn't compare
customer_reviews.text: Sorry UpNature but I don't think this is pure Moringa oil. I have another brand but I thought I'd try this one because of the great price but sorry to say it doesn't compare. It doesn't smell like it's pure moringa oil and it's not as rich - it's thinner and doesn't really absorb well. I will continue to use it because I do love Moringa Oil but not this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Stagno

customer_reviews.title: Moringa Oil is straight life.
customer_reviews.text: I've done some research on Moringa Oil and its known for its benefits of natural beauty. I use it in my natural oil blend of Almond, Jojoba, Vitamin E, Apricot and now Moringa Oil. I'm 50 yrs old and don't look a day over 35. I also use it in my natural hair mask of egg yolks, castor Oil and now Moringa Oil. Super beneficial for hair growth. I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Luva300ZX

customer_reviews.title: Broke my skin out
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this so it remains to be seen how it will work on my 2 gray hairs lol. But after reading online that Amla oil is good for the face too, I used it on my face. I do not have sensitive skin at all and use all types of oil on my face at night. I also literally have never had more than one zit on my face in my life and this broke me out so bad. I had like 10 zits on my forehead. I’ll update on the gray hairs but I just want to warn everyone to be careful using this on your face
customer_reviews.author: Monica Ann Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I use CBD oil for hot flashes. When I went to Sweden, CBD is illegal there so I took Copaiba Oil from Doterra as I was told it works like CBD oil. It did!!! I didn't like spending so much for doterras so got this one when I came home. I tried it for several days, over a week, and it just didn't work for me for some reason. This isn't to say it won't work for someone else, though, as we are all different. I'm back on the CBD and feeling cool :-)
customer_reviews.author: rlhinca

customer_reviews.title: Oil should be yellowish not clear like the bottle i received
customer_reviews.text: This oil is not real 100% Moringa oil as stated. Oil should be yellowish not clear like the bottle i received . Also picture shows what the color should look like , but when you get it is not. this is some other cheap filler oil . I would not buy this product .
customer_reviews.author: Devon Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my left wrist and have been using this regular since I bought it. I am in less pain and have more movement in my wrist. Already recommended to friends and they have purchased and seen results.
customer_reviews.author: Alice McFall

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: UpNature Alma oil has done wonders on my hair. I mainly bought this oil to prevent premature greying. It seems to have helped a little with the grey hairs that are just starting to come out. It has helped revive my hair from being dry to looking healthy and it shines. My ends that use to appear dry and brittle now look healthy. I’m not a fan of the smell but it is tolerable. I mainly use this as an over night treatment with my hair wrapped in a cloth and I wash my hair in the morning. This leaves my hair really soft. I like to do my hair treatment two times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: I really like this oil
customer_reviews.text: I really like this oil. I was expecting it to smell like people complain about in the YouTube videos. But this doesn't. It makes my hair strong and moisturized when used as a sealant. I plan to never run out of this.
customer_reviews.author: Ereka

customer_reviews.title: It surprised me
customer_reviews.text: I put a few drops in my water and it started clearing my sinuses within an hour. I put drops in my diffuser at night in Dallas unhealthy air quality conditions, and I could breath easily at night. I put some drops in my conditioner and my scalp felt amazing. I love this oil.
customer_reviews.author: Ceci Rees

customer_reviews.title: Purchase the essential oil book then you'll know what oils to buy it really does help
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these oils to make my own pain relief Rollerball pain relief oil. I can't tell you how it really works right now I just started it just actually just put it on and it relieve my pain from a 3 out of 5 pain score
customer_reviews.author: LoriR

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Pain Reliever!!!
customer_reviews.text: The scent is very mild yet a little earthy (in a good way) ,but it doesn't really stand out. Most importantly though i bought this for the pain relief benefits, and i will most definitely say without a doubt 110% this oil WORKS!!!! You don't need but a few droplets on the area that hurts, rub it in and that's it!!! For me i use it on my left knee, the joints in my hands, and for my neck& shoulder pain. I get instant relief!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reddalop

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail hair finishing product!
customer_reviews.text: I use a drop to tame my hair after I blow dry. I comb it in the crispy fried parts of my hair, and those areas become as healthy looking and feeling as the new growth underneath. I only shampoo and condition every 4 days or so, and the little amla oil i comb in the first day makes my hair so soft and healthy feeling each day. It looks wet for about an hour after combing into my dry hair, and then it becomes dry and soft like baby hair! Also, it has a rosin scent. It disappears in my hair, though.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gatewood

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I take the lid off and sniff it straight from the bottle, lol. Helps with headaches
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I can only say that after a few visits to the doctor, buying ointments in Europe, trying many different lotions and oils at ridiculous pricing. This is the best kept secret for the pricing, results and satisfaction. I no longer have inflammation, swelling and a desperate urge to scratch my dry patch of skin till it hurts. I urge others to please try it if you have a similar situation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for my dry winter hair!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this oil. I use about five drops on my dry hair and it makes it look shiny and healthy all day. It was delivered in great packaging and very quickly. The fragrance isn't bad kinda peppery! I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was not sealed for tamper proof. The writing on the bottle was smeared all writing unledigble.
customer_reviews.author: rosa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t help
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t help at all.........waste of money. No any change to my hair
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Has been helping with healing of my broken hand and helped with the fibromyalgia. Will buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Smells heavenly.
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite oil. I use it on my face since it smells so good. More gentle than tea tree for the face. Mild balsam scent is addicting.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Pain reliever!!
customer_reviews.text: It had the same pain relief as the more expensive brand!! My husband's pain had the same immediate relief as the other brand, soon happy we found this! Also got the Eucalyptus for our diffuser and it worked great. Will buy again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: M. CEPERO

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My hair loves this! I also put a few drops in my henna mixture. I put a little on my hair while it is still wet. It’s pretty emollient, so you will likely want to use it on wet hair or on dry ends at night. I rub some onto my scalp after I henna to prevent itchines from the henna application.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Stein Designs

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: This oil is great. I mixed it with carrier oil, castor oil. It goes on smoothly and not to greasy. No ugly odor. I used 20 drops to 10ml carrier oil. It does seem to ease some of my joint pain, but I think that next batch I will use 30 drops.
customer_reviews.author: skat

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: After less than a week, my back spasms are gone. I sleep better and wake up without pain and stiffness. LOVE THIS OIL! We noticed no particular scent, but weren't really expecting anything one way or the other, as we have never used Copaiba oil. Diluted the oil with Cocomut oil and applied topically.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Whoever had eczema must try this
customer_reviews.text: Whoever had eczema must try this,I start to have eczema for about half year, was very itchy on my neck,back,under arm, chest every day,I was so so upset , nothing could help unless cortizone cream which I know its not good for me, I was surprise this was working on my eczema, stop itchy immediately after I used, my skin is back to normal since I use this for a week, I apply on my skin whenever I feel itchy, anyone should try this if you had the same problem, hope it work for you too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: NOT 100% AMLA
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that I paid 17 for an oil that’s isn’t even pure alma oil.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Helps with pain/soreness and have been using diluted in avocado ...
customer_reviews.text: Helps with pain/soreness and have been using diluted in avocado oil for a rash. Not gone yet but has diminished a lot.
customer_reviews.author: truth trumps propaganda

customer_reviews.title: Received instant relief for uncomfortable knee .
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on an uncomfortable knee , and received immediate relief . I was pleasantly surprised !! I did not dilute it with any carrier oil , but used it straight from the bottle , and just rubbed it in . There was no irritating results whatsoever . It was very soothing , and had a lovely , subtle , refreshing smell . This product has been very helpful for me .
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D.

customer_reviews.title: It is really helping reduce my pain
customer_reviews.text: I've been through one bottle and this is my second, and I can say it is helping reduce my pain. I have lower back issues and I rub into my back and it goes to work. I don't know how or why it works, I just know for me, this stuff is really working. It goes a long way and the bottle is a good value. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: J. A. hays

customer_reviews.title: excellent ..it works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this copabia to try on my hip pain....love the price the smell and it work fantastic ...UP NATURE proves to be a wonderful company to work with...will use the again . I reordered because it works and upnature a great company to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: tsb333

customer_reviews.title: Not for internal use
customer_reviews.text: Work's great on sore muscles when mixed with nonfractionated coconut oil
customer_reviews.author: Oddone76

customer_reviews.title: This is Definitely Not Moringa
customer_reviews.text: Does not Smell Like Moringa Oil. does not have the viscosity of Moringa Oil, does not have the color of Moringa Oil... Therefore is not a genuine product. Second time an Amazon Recommended product is fake...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please read this if you are BLONDIE. I didn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: Please read this if you are BLONDIE. I didn’t try this oil enough times to see the results but I noticed that it makes my blonde color turn a bit brassy so I discontinued using it. I will try to use this oil for something else, maybe for my eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: Kseniya

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works to relief pain, also after mosquito bites the itching goes away almost immediately when I apply this oil. The smell is not of my favorites but I don't really mind about the smell if everything else works.
customer_reviews.author: R.R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. My friend turned me onto it for post op pain. After the 2 week pain med regimen ended, I still had pain from my triple hernia repair, the dr said it was nerve pain, till my skin attached to the mesh. I used this along with ice packs and it really helped me.
customer_reviews.author: JDL

customer_reviews.title: Great Summer moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can use this on my face on a steamy Summer day and not feel ‘greasy’ or sticky. It absorbs quickly and moisturizes without feeling heavy or oily. I use it on my face, hands, legs and feet as well as running my hands through my hair after applying it. I had almost given up finding a good Summer moisturizer that wouldn’t make my face break out. The smell is slightly pungent when first applied but disappears almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda J

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great oil!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is a steal! You get a lot of oil for what you pay for. I used this oil to help with my face's skin. I mixed it with other oils, but I have found that my skin looks great. I was happy with the quality of this oil and am glad that I purchased it. When I run out, I will be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 stars ? Read reviews ..... Its a sham
customer_reviews.text: The price and before I dug into reviews with 4 and 1/2 Stars I bought it later to read the reviews to realize this is like most every other oil I get on Amazon diluted with some other generic most likely GMO oil and yet this has 4.5 Stars I don't understand
customer_reviews.author: Uhdeman

customer_reviews.title: It helps regrow hair for certain types of hair loss
customer_reviews.text: I mixed it with Shea butter and massage it into my hands, feet, joints, face: for moisture, anti inflammatory, reduce lines/wrinkles and scars! My husband uses it on his scalp to help with hair growth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality oil, Not a subtle scent
customer_reviews.text: This feels good on the skin, is moisturizing without being too greasy, and is awesome for a massage oil. The scent is woodsy and, in my opinion, better for men if you’re looking to dilute essential oils for their smell. It worked well with cedar, pepper, and herb oils, but it overpowered rose, lavender, and even peppermint unless I used a LOT. I’d buy it again, but not to make roller ball blends for myself and my friends as I had intended.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa R.

customer_reviews.title: Best Organic Essential Oil
customer_reviews.text: This is the 6th bottle ...I love these oils and I only ordered from SVA from now on... because it is the best NON GMO ORGANIC oil I have used. The glass bottle is dark and the dropper is extra nice to have in a good packaging for delivery. I have used other companies and the bottle were leaking or broken and no dropper was included. So this company is very professional, efficient and good quality products at an affordable price. Love it Love it! I can order all the oils because of the great prices. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Not a cure but helps
customer_reviews.text: I have R.A. and this tamed down my pain throughout the day and helps so much to soothe pain and helps to get some sleep
customer_reviews.author: Patricia parkinson

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to use. He suffers from neuropathy brought on by chemotherapy. I mixed it 1 part to 4 parts grape seed oil for him to rub on his feet. I'm thrilled to say that it helps him! He even says it works better on his feet than CBD cream!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: copaiba oil
customer_reviews.text: I did not rate this for pain relief because I didn't of this use. I bought it for my dog's dry itchy skin and for this it very good. It is very heavy and only takes a few drops in his shampoo. Be very care how much you use or it be hard to rise out. I only gave this 3 stars for sent because I don't care for it but it is not offensive.
customer_reviews.author: dobby

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Anytime my boyfriend gets a headache, I rub this in the area it is hurting. Within 5 minutes his headaches are gone. He is now a believer in essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Restored the softness to my dried finger tips. I love this new find. Read about the oil on a doctor website. Very pleased with the results on my face as well. Goes right into my skin and leaves it soft.
customer_reviews.author: Magie

customer_reviews.title: product
customer_reviews.text: Got good relief worth the money and the scent was good.
customer_reviews.author: The Taz

customer_reviews.title: Copaiba Essential Oil
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my bone to bone arthritic joints! It works fantastically & I have given many bottles away to friends with sore muscles,joints & relaxes me before going to bed!
customer_reviews.author: MotherHen

customer_reviews.title: Fibromyalgia  relief finally!!!!👍
customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia for years nothing has ever worked, this an awesome find that is affordable I can mix 1 to 1 with coconut or sesame carrier oil so it lasts longer and still works It smells wonderfull
customer_reviews.author: dkdante

customer_reviews.title: MIXED WITH LAVENDER OIL ITS PAIN ERASER
customer_reviews.text: MY PAIN MANAGEMENT DOC SUGGESTED MY HUSBAND RUB 5 DROPS COPAIBA MIXED WITH 3 DROPS LAVENDER E OIL on back of my neck nightly. It relaxes both of us & my necks more flexible and pain free.
customer_reviews.author: Llama Mama

customer_reviews.title: wow - great quality, great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is very high quality amla oil at a great price. no more itchy scalp, and as a bonus I found out it was great to moisturize my hands, too. Plus I didn't have to pay extra for shipping. keep it up!
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Funny scent
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced e.o. I wasn't fond of the scent. But that is just me. We were trying it for stress. Using it in a diffuser. But I couldn't get past the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Frampton

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quick delivery. Great value for the money. Works for pain and absorbs quickly. Has A nice scent. Not medicinal smelling . Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Willie M Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good essential oil, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I feel this is an excellent essential oil at a very good price. I am pleased with my purchase. Thank you and God bless.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil for my hair!!
customer_reviews.text: The oil makes much hair feel and look so my thicker. I hope it will help with hair growth for thinning hair. I would recommend this oil 100%!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila A.

customer_reviews.title: Loved the product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product, works well for me. I use it externally on my sore knees. Happy with packaging and delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: There are better ones out there
customer_reviews.text: Hey, I like the fact that it's in a big, glass dropper bottle...And it works all right, I guess, on skin and hair. But do your research and see if you can't find a more potent, pure form of this oil. I did! It wouldn't surprise me if this one is diluted with a carrier oil.
customer_reviews.author: Essie W.

customer_reviews.title: Past purchases great but this one not so much
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased Upnature Moringa oil for over a year to moisturize my skin and have loved it. But my most recent purchase of moringa oil is thicker, yellow in color and has a weird, not moringa oil scent to it. I don't feel comfortable putting this product on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: SheenD

customer_reviews.title: Best deal found online.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best value I have found. The taste is light mint, which I appreciate. I have not found any real pain relief, but that could be due to the fact I just started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Shire

customer_reviews.title: Moringa oil & powder really excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I used the Moranga oil in my hair and right shoulder, and I Love the smell. I love the product and I Love the Moranga powder, I bought at Moses Lake health pantry, this product really work to help me relax, so that I could sleep, I know it supposed to give you energy, but I needed to sleep because I had hurt myself really bad, it relaxed me and now that I'm recovering it's now giving me energy for the day. people need to try both products I think they are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Kutaan Yaawditee

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I read an article that is a good oil for follicles and it helps grow hair. I don't t use it a lot because it makes it very greasy. I use it as a mask once a week
customer_reviews.author: KPfitness

customer_reviews.title: Star ingredient
customer_reviews.text: I use this w cbd oil in a balm. It’s awesome and 99% of whom I have given it to (many!) love it and ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: jynel sawyer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this for pain and arthritis.
customer_reviews.text: Shoulder pain. Topical application: 5 drops Cobaipa Oil to one ounce carrier oil. I used Jojoba. This worked awesomely!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri H. Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Really moistens your skin
customer_reviews.text: I’m in my mid 60’s so dry skin is really a problem but this oil turns my skin dewy looking without an oily look. I wish I had known about Moringa oil earlier in life. Of course nothing will take away wrinkles but this oil softens the appearance of them. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: dale hensley

customer_reviews.title: Not moringa oil
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brand to replace another brand of moringa oil that had become too pricey. This does not look, smell or feel like moringa oil as I know it. It lays on top of skin instead of absorbing in. How can I get my money back?
customer_reviews.author: wayne b.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like using it on my face.It absorbs quickly and doesn`t leave stickiness. The smeel isn`t the best,but not unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: constance gomez

customer_reviews.title: Amla
customer_reviews.text: Learning more and more about Amla. What I love is that it is good for hair and skin. I have used it in my beard oil for my guys friend...they have told me it feels and and they love it. Will definately order again.
customer_reviews.author: CHM

customer_reviews.title: Seems like pretty good stuff and works great on chiggers
customer_reviews.text: Seems like pretty good stuff and works great on chiggers! Best thing I've ever use for them. The bites stop itching in a matter of seconds! I wasn't expecting that just thought I'd try it one day
customer_reviews.author: tc

customer_reviews.title: Bestest
customer_reviews.text: Surviving on this oil for about a year. It really helps with aching muscle pain. Very light but pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: Gurly gurl

customer_reviews.title: If it works for you...go ahead
customer_reviews.text: You do get alot of product for your money but the smell made me nauseous. It does have a slite vanilla smell with undertone of resin.
customer_reviews.author: jady

customer_reviews.title: HELPS MY ARTHRITIS
customer_reviews.text: My wife mixes this with the turmeric oil for me to rub on to my toe that has arthritis, help helps with the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Who knew?
customer_reviews.text: I have osteoarthritis and have been trying everything for relief.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Feels tacky and icky. Smell isn't offensive but it's not pleasing either.... Doesn't really do any of the things it says it might do.... Threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Iolanthe

customer_reviews.title: Oil for life
customer_reviews.text: I only started using it! I have to use a carrier oil with it. So far it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: MC Siu

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I had read that its good antifungal and my mother used it for her fingernails. Helped with the discoloration and it stopped the seperation of nail from nail bed. Other nail products would do anything for her. She used it along with tea tree oil.
customer_reviews.author: carmen calzada

customer_reviews.title: Potent and comparable to CBD oil
customer_reviews.text: I took one drop in water. To me, it had very similar effects as CBD oil.
customer_reviews.author: michael r smith

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT 100% Amal Essential Oil.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not 100 percent essential oil of Amla. It clearly says it’s made with sesame oil which is a terrible oil. Please stop selling items under false pretense.
customer_reviews.author: Ayanna jones

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, sizable quantity
customer_reviews.text: I use this essential oil for pain and inflammation. There are less expensive and more expensive products available. I liked the owner’s commitment to quality statement when searching products; the quality matches the description and I am really enjoying the dropper option for control of the amount used.

customer_reviews.title: The scent and the healing properties
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this oil for years since I have heard about it but I have observed the smell is not as it was before which was the first reason I was drawn to this product. It has also assisted me with some discomfort in my right arm which I had difficulty raising. I continue to use it but it does not give that same effect.
customer_reviews.author: shari

customer_reviews.title: Wait to see
customer_reviews.text: I use it for hair. It is said good for hair growth. But it is very oily, I have to use it at night and have my hair washed next morning otherwise my hair is too oily. Not sure if it is helpful to grow my hair for just using it for a week.

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy to find this on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find this on Amazon. I have used it in the past. It is great for dry skin, scraps and bruises. I had my eyebrows tattooed and this oil took the sting away immediately.

customer_reviews.title: Soft Skin
customer_reviews.text: This oil makes my skin feel so soft. I put it on after washing my face every night. It absorbs quickly, depending on how much oil you use. I look forward to using it.

product_meta.title: Moringa Seeds Essential Oil Liquid Extract 4 OZ - Rejuvenate Dull Skin - Great for Hair and Face, Botanical Anti-aging Beauty - Great for Cuts, Rashes, Burns - Pure, Undiluted- With Glass Dropper
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY MORINGA ESSENTIAL OIL: 100% Pure, Gentle and Effective Natural Moringa Essential Oil. Non-GMO. Therapeutic Grade. Packaged in the USA.
SAFETY PRECAUTION: For external use only.
GREAT ANTI-INFLAMMATORY: The oil is one of the best moisturizers for the skin, and it's a powerful anti-inflammatory to help heal wounds like cuts, scrapes, scars, and burns.
ANTI-AGING PROPERTIES: Moringa oil rejuvenates dull, tired and aging skin. Moringa oil helps improve the appearance of wrinkles and prevents sagging of facial muscles.
REJUVENATE YOUR SKIN: Moringa extract is essentially an herbal face food! Use by itself or add a few drops to make a moringa soap or lotion.
